Installation package for KMM 1.x and SKSM
Installation package project for KMM 1.x and SKSM
Another instance of this application is already running.
Profile configuration hasn't been loaded. Unable to continue.
Configuration file for profile "%1" not found. Default configuration will be used.
Profile folder not specified or doesn't exist
You can use the default folder or select a different one. Using the default folder is not recommended because profile data can occupy a lot of space, which may be undesirable for the system drive.
Some changes won't take effect until the application has been restarted
Are you sure you want to uninstall %1
This action will uninstall the virtual file system service and allow you to uninstall this appliction correctly. Afterwards, you should delete all application files and restart your computer.
Virtual file system has been successfully uninstalled. Restart your computer to complete the uninstallation procedure.
Failed to uninstall the virtual file system service.
Automatically show information about the installation package
Use HTTPS protocol in FOMod XML-scheme
Source code can be found on
%1 installation folder not found or doesn't exist. Select the folder manually to continue.
To change instance, the application must be restarted
Do you want to restart now?
Are you sure you want to delete instance "%1"?

This cannot be undone.
This folder and all its contents will be deleted: %1
Invalid Instance name. Choose another name.
A instance with this name already exists. Specify a different name.
Failed to create a new instance
Do you want to save changes?
Some additional software could not be found on your computer
Install this software or disable it in the manager.
Waiting for the additional software to terminate in order to attach it to the main process
Failed to attach to the main process
Are you sure you want to remove all programs? This action cannot be undone.
This action cannot be completed as long as the VFS is active
There is already a mod with the same name as you specified. Specify a different name.
The contents of the selected folder will be copied to the folder where mod data are located
The contents of the selected folder will be used as mod files
Are you sure you want to uninstall "%1"?
Are you sure you want to uninstall "%1" and delete the corresponding log entry?
Are you sure you want to delete "%1" entry from log?
Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.
Profile with this name already exist
Importing data from another mod manager can result in loss of data in this instance.
The current selected game does not match the game controlled by this mod-manager. Import at your own risk.
Data on the game managed by this mod manager is not found. Import at your own risk.
Data from %1 was found. Begin import?
Are you sure you want to load default tags?
Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This will remove him from the system and break its connection with all mods.
Enter your username and password to log in to your account.
Are you sure you want to sign out of "%1" account?

This display tracks the number of queued requests to %1 and the remaining daily and hourly requests. The %1 API limits you to a pool of requests per day and requests per hour. It is dynamically updated every time a request is completed. If you run out of requests, you will be unable to queue downloads, check updates, query mod info and so on. Both pools must be consumed before this happens.
Query limit to %1 has been reached for a period of time
Automatic check for mods updates started
Automatic check for mod updates done. %1 mod(s) updated
Unable to start the automatic mods update check because the available number of requests has been exhausted
There's a new version (%1) of this mod available on %2
This mod was not found on %1
Failed to get file association information
There is no primary NXM handler registered in the system. Install %1 as the primary handler?
The downloads folder is not specified or does not exist. Select the folder where you want to store the downloads
Not enough space to save the file
The device does not support the features required to save the file
Are you sure you want to delete all downloads?
Are you sure you want to delete all installed downloads?
Could not request download information for %1
Failed to restore download information from %1

Refreshing downloads list will cause any running downloads to be paused. If the download source doesn't suport resuming you would have to restart the download.
Are you really sure you want to refresh the list?
Enter a URL to start download
Enter new network ID for this download
Failed to load the virtual file system library. Unable to continue.
Virtual file system (VFS) service has not been installed. After this window has been closed, VFS service and driver will be installed.
Failed to install the virtual file system service.
Unhandled exception occurred in virtual file system (VFS) service. The service will be restarted.
Failed to mount the virtual file system.
Failed to unmount virtual file system.
Failed to prepare the mount point.
File system can't be mounted in a folder that is not empty
Either delete this folder or delete all files from there and try again.
Do you want to unmount VFS and exit the program?
Virtual file system is not active
Following applications were launched from the VFS. Close them and retry.
Unable to install the driver. The driver might not be installed.
Unable to assign drive letter or mount point. This might be because mount point is not empty or is assigned to a different device.
Virtual file system is not running.
Program "%1" could not be found on your computer
Specify the program's location to perform the sorting.
Some errors have been found while checking the project
Do you want to save now?
An element with this ID already exists in the project.
Are you sure you want to delete the step "%1"? All groups in this step will be deleted as well.
Are you sure you want to delete the group "%1"? All elements in this group will be deleted as well.
This component is optional but is recommended for the current configuration.
This component cannot be used in the current configuration. For example, some of the required mods are missing.
This component can be used in the current configuration, but its correct operation is not guaranteed. For example, the versions of the required mods do not match.

Remove flag from the entire project? Deletion will remove all references to the flag in the project.
You can also rename references to the deleted flag by adding a prefix in their name (%1).
Are you sure you want to cancel the installation?
Select an element to view the description

Installation Wizard didn't find any valid files to install.
This might be because: - Your $(GameShortName) copy and installed mods do not match this mod's requirements. - The components configuration is invalid. In order to solve this problem, contact either the mod's author or the installer's author.
This ID is already used by "%1"
The file might be corrupted, or its format is not supported.

This mod is already installed. To reinstall, it is recommended that you uninstall it and then run the installation again.
Are you sure you want to reinstall this mod on top of the existing files?
